definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy
Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

sentences.english: Virgo is an earth sign, putting Saturn's focus on what's here and now.
sentences.chinese: 室女座是地球的跡象，使土星的重點是在這裏和現在。
親愛的室女座，開心一點。

sentences.english: Two swans meeting on the Jungfrau.
sentences.chinese: 是兩隻天鵝在室女星座的相逢。

sentences.english: This plaque is decorated with the sign of Virgo.
sentences.chinese: 這塊牌子裝飾着室女宮的標記。

sentences.english: The lovely island universe resides in the large Virgo cluster of galaxies.
sentences.chinese: 這個美麗的宇宙島處在巨大的室女星系團中。

sentences.english: Virgo is sensitive too, only if it's practical to be sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 室女座是過於敏感，只有當它的實際是敏感。

definition: the twelve equatorial constellations or signs of the zodiac in Western astronomy and astrology, namely: Aries 白羊[Bai2 yang2], Taurus 金牛[Jin4 niu2], Gemini 雙子|双子[Shuang1 zi3], Cancer 巨蟹[Ju4 xie4], Leo 獅子|狮子[Shi1 zi3], Virgo 室女[Shi4 nu:3], Libra 天秤[Tian1 cheng4], Scorpio 天蠍|天蝎[Tian1 xie1], Sagittarius 人馬|人马[Ren2 ma3], Capricorn 摩羯[Mo2 jie2], Aquarius 寶瓶|宝瓶[Bao3 ping2], Pisces 雙魚|双鱼[Shuang1 yu2]
concubine/I, your servant (deprecatory self-reference for women)
